new.description: In this tutorial, we show you how to customize your Helperbird experience by adding the features you use most often. Get ready to boost your productivity and accessibility on the web.
new.title: Adding features to the Quick Actions Area

new.description: In this tutorial, we show you how to customize your Helperbird experience by adding the features you use most often. Get ready to boost your productivity and accessibility on the web.
new.title: Adding features to the Quick Actions Area

new.description: With a reading guide, line focus, and dyslexia ruler, this extension makes reading easier and more accessible. Our tutorial shows you how to get started with this powerful tool.
new.title: How to use the Dyslexia Ruler ( Reading Guide, Line Focus) in Helperbird

new.description: This tutorial explains both options, so you can choose the one that works best for you. Whether you're using Helperbird for personal or professional use, our login process is simple and secure.
new.title: How to Login to Helperbird

new.description: In this tutorial, we walk you through how to use our PDF Reader and support feature. With Helperbird, you can personalize your reading experience, adjust settings to fit your needs, and more.
new.title: How to use the PDF Reader & support in Helperbird

new.description: With Helperbird's Reading Mode feature, you can remove clutter and distractions from any website or document. Our step-by-step tutorial shows you how to use this powerful feature.
new.title: How to use the Reading Mode

new.description: This step-by-step tutorial shows you how to download and install the extension on your device. Whether you're using Chrome, Edge, Firefox, iPadOS, iOS, or Safari, we've got you covered.
new.title: How to download Helperbird

new.description: In this tutorial, we show you how to get started with this powerful feature and take your web reading experience to the next level.
new.title: Use Immersive reader on any website

new.description: If you've made changes to Helperbird and want to start fresh, or if you're having issues with the extension and want to troubleshoot, resetting the settings is the way to go.
new.title: How To Reset Settings

new.description: Fortunately, Helperbird makes it easy to search for the features you want. We will guide you step-by-step through the process of using the search function in Helperbird, so you can quickly find and access the features you need.
new.title: How To Search For Features
